features: 【Stable 2.4G Wireless Connection】Powerful and reliable connection of wireless keyboard mouse is up to 10 m(393.7in). Wireless keyboard with mouse combo share a Nano receiver (stored at the bottom of the mouse) without installing any additional software, plug and play. Keep your desk clean and tidy.

【Efficient Desktop Keyboard Wireless + Wide Compatibility】The wireless computer keyboard preserving the keys of the numeric keypad, the full-size keyboard has 12 function keys allows you to quickly access the music/volume/mail, etc(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System). The keyboard mouse combo wireless is compatible with Windows XP / ME/ Vista / 7 / 8 /10 / 11 operating systems. Work well with devices which has USB slot like PC, Laptop, Macbook, desktop, Chrome-book, Smart TV.

【Silent Keyboard and Mouse】The wireless office keyboard’s scissor switch keys provide less noise. Light and responsive tactile keystroke makes typing soft and comfortable. Silent cordless mouse with adjustable DPI, with a default setting of 1600 DPI, allowing you to adjust the DPI speed to your preference. It is fast and precise, keep quiet while maintaining sensitivity. Never worry about disturbing others to rest while working or playing.

【Ultra-Slim and Portable Design】Wireless pc keyboard has 14.55x5.5x0.8in(37*14*2cm), 0.8in(2cm) ultra-thin ABS plastic body, which can save space and easy to carry. Kit keyboard and mouse wireless’s sleek design is super match with office desk. Perfect for business travel, office, home, library and many public occasions.

【Battery Included + Keyboard Cover】 Long-lasting basic AA and AAA batteries are included in the wireless keyboard and mice combo, battery life between 3 and 5 months(varies by usage conditions). The included cover can protect your wireless office keyboard from dust and liquid. 2-Year Warranty: If quality problem with wireless keyboard & mouse set occur within one year, we will replace the new one to you for free.

【Conexión Inalámbrica Estable de 2.4G】La conexión potente y confiable del mouse con teclado inalámbrico es de hasta 10 m (393.7in). El combo de teclado inalámbrico con mouse comparte un receptor Nano (almacenado en la parte inferior del mouse) sin instalar ningún software adicional, plug and play. Mantenga su escritorio limpio y ordenado.

【Teclado de Escritorio Eficiente Inalámbrico + Amplia Compatibilidad】El teclado ordenador inalámbrico que conserva las teclas del teclado numérico y el teclado de tamaño completo. El teclado ergonomico español y las 12 teclas de función le permiten acceder rápidamente a la música / controlar el volumen / correo, etc. El combo inalámbrico de teclado y ratón es compatible con los sistemas operativos Windows XP / ME / Vista / 7/8/10 / OS.

【Teclado y Ratón Silenciosos】Las teclas del interruptor de tijera del teclado de oficina inalámbrico proporcionan menos ruido. La pulsación de tecla táctil ligera y sensible hace que escribir sea suave y cómodo. Ratón inalámbrico silencioso con DPI ajustables, con una configuración predeterminada de 1600 DPI. Es rápido y preciso, guarda silencio mientras mantiene la sensibilidad. Nunca se preocupe por molestar a los demás para que descansen mientras trabaja o juega.

【Diseño Ultradelgado y Portátil】 El teclado inalámbrico PC tiene un cuerpo de plástico ABS ultrafino de 14.55x5.5x0.8in (37 * 14 * 2cm), 0.8in (2cm), que puede ahorrar espacio y es fácil de transportar. El elegante diseño del kit de teclado y mouse inalámbricos combina perfectamente con el escritorio de la oficina. Perfecto para viajes de negocios, oficina, hogar, biblioteca y muchas ocasiones públicas.

【Batería Incluida + Cubierta del Teclado】 Se incluyen baterías AA y AAA básicas de larga duración en el combo de teclado y mouse inalámbricos, la duración de la batería es de entre 3 y 5 meses (varía según las condiciones de uso). La cubierta incluida puede proteger su teclado silencioso de oficina inalámbrico del polvo y los líquidos. Garantía de 2 Año: si ocurre un problema de calidad con el ratón y teclado inalámbrico dentro de 2 año, le reemplazaremos el nuevo de forma gratuita.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra-Silent Keyboard and Mouse Combo for Laptop Wireless keyboard featuring silent scissor switches, providing you with a quieter typing experience. Mouse is also designed to operate silently, allowing you to work or play without disturbing others. Adjustable DPI Mouse (Default1600) Wireless mouse features DPI levels, allowing you to choose your preferred cursor movement speed. Whether you prefer a slower or faster cursor speed, you can enjoy precise and smooth navigation.

Compact and Portable Keyboard and Mouse Combo Designed to be slim and small for easy carrying. It conveniently fits into your laptop bag, making it perfect for on-the-go productivity. Ergonomic Keyboard Mouse Set for Comfortable Use Provides a comfortable keyboard angles and mouse arc. The carefully crafted design ensures a natural and comfortable hand position, reducing strain and fatigue.

Wireless Convenience with Wide Compatibility Experience wireless convenience with this keyboard and mouse set, compatible with your PC, desktop computer, or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 operating systems. One USB for Keyboard and Mouse Wireless keyboard and silent mouse share a single USB receiver, saving device ports without the need for complex setups. Plug and play for instant convenience, making your work more efficient.

Dustproof and Waterproof Wireless keyboard combo includes a free keyboard cover, which is durable and designed to protect your keyboard. It is dustproof and waterproof. Keyboard with Indicator Lights Stay informed and in control with the clear intuitive LED lights that provide status updates on important functions such as power, connectivity.

Non-Slip Silicone Pad The usb keyboard comes with non-slip silicone pads on the bottom. It can keep your laptop keyboard stable and bring a comfortable typing experience. Long Battery Life Wireless keyboard is powered by 2 AA battery, while the computer mouse requires 2 AAA batteries. They are included in the package.

Do the keyboard and mouse come with a sleep function? Yes, both the keyboard and mouse are equipped with an automatic sleep mode for power saving, and press any key to activate them. Is there only one receiver for the keyboard and mouse? Yes, the KM9000 keyboard and mouse share the same receiver, which is located at the bottom of the mouse. It's plug-and-play, and if you happen to lose the receiver or need a replacement, please refer to the user manual. What should I do if the keyboard or mouse is not working? Ensure that the USB receiver is directly connected to the computer. If the issue persists, try reconnecting according to the instructions in the manual (pairing). What devices or systems are compatible with the keyboard and mouse combo? It is compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10/11 operating systems. It can be used with devices with USB slots, such as PCs, laptops, Macbooks, desktops, Chromebooks, and smart TVs. Does the wireless keyboard have function keys? Yes, the keyboard features 12 function keys, including FN+F1-12, providing instant access to various functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this because a couple keys broke on my laptop. I love the simplicity of this keyboard, it came packaged in the manufacturer's box, but very well protected, batteries included for the keyboard and mouse (note this is not a rechargeable set but I knew that prior to ordering.) They work in tangent with the same USB key. The mouse is very sleek and thin which is good for my wrist, keeps it in a more neutral position. The keyboard comes with a well-fitting dust protector. I think my only problem with it is it almost feels a little tacky(rubber feel) which is harder to type quickly. I may just need to get used to that though. It can easily be removed if it bothers me in the long run.Overall super excites and pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the TopMate 2.4G Silent Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Ultra Slim Combo, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations. This keyboard is a true gem, offering a combination of functionality, style, and convenience that is hard to beat.First and foremost, the keyboard itself is small and lightweight, making it perfect for those who are always on the go. It's incredibly portable, allowing me to easily slip it into my bag and take it with me wherever I need to work. Despite its compact size, the keys are well-spaced and comfortable to type on, providing a pleasant typing experience.One of the standout features of this keyboard is the see-through plastic cover. This innovative addition not only adds a touch of elegance to the design but also serves as a protective layer, keeping the keyboard clean and free from dust and debris. It's a practical feature that ensures the longevity of the keyboard and maintains its sleek appearance.The overall design of the TopMate combo is reminiscent of Apple products, with its sleek and minimalist aesthetic. This makes it a great fit for those who appreciate a clean and modern look. The keyboard and mouse complement each other perfectly, creating a unified and visually appealing setup.Speaking of the mouse, I was pleasantly surprised by its performance. Despite its small size, it glides smoothly across surfaces and is incredibly responsive. It's comfortable to hold and fits perfectly in my hand, making navigation effortless. Whether I'm working on spreadsheets or browsing the web, the mouse delivers precision and accuracy.In terms of connectivity, the 2.4G wireless technology provides a reliable and stable connection. I haven't experienced any lag or dropouts during my usage, ensuring a seamless experience. The setup process was straightforward, requiring no complicated installation or pairing procedures.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the TopMate 2.4G Silent Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Ultra Slim Combo. It offers a perfect blend of functionality, portability, and style. The keyboard's see-through plastic cover is a standout feature, keeping the keys clean and well-protected. The mouse is a joy to use, with its smooth performance and comfortable design. If I ever need to replace my current computer, I will turn to this product again. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and stylish wireless keyboard and mouse combo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value and Great Alternative to Black Keyboard and Mouse
reviews.reviewText: This is a good value for a wireless keyboard and mouse set, and they work well. I do have some specific comments.Good:* At only 14.5" wide including a full numeric pad, the compact size saves desktop space.* The light aqua blue color is aesthetically pleasing and does not show dust and dirt as readily as black.* Keys and mouse have good tactile feel.Bad:* Manual should be improved. It has no mention of the small on/off switch in the mouse's bottom face, and no instructions on the proper turn on sequence. I did not see the small on/off switch (factory default is off) and of course the mouse did not work. I thought the batteries had been sitting in the box too long and replaced them but without success. I finally saw the switch and moved it to the ON position. Still no go! I had to remove and reinsert the batteries and the wireless adapter from the PC to make the mouse work.Ugly:I finally realized that there is a thin plastic film glued on the keyboard's top section which can be removed. Doing so improves the evenness of that top section. The matte finish on the rest of the keyboard has some uneven blotches of color which detracts from the overall appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice outboard keyboard and mouse.
reviews.reviewText: This TopMate wireless keyboard and mouse combination works very well with my new Macbook Air, even though it is marketed for PCs. At 14.5" width, it is a little narrower than my old Logitech 17" keyboard yet typing is quite comfortable. Its small Nano receiver is only usable with USB-A ports, so I purchased USB-A to USB-C adapter (Type C Thunderbolt 4 OTG Converter by Henrety) at $5 for a 3-pack - these adapters work great with the keyboard and mouse. There is a disclaimer that function keys (hot keys) are not fully compatible with a Mac, but this is not important. More important is that the Delete key, Home key, End key and Page Up/Down keys are fully compatible, so generating long documents in Word are easy to manage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mouse is okay but the keyboard is not worth it
reviews.reviewText: I had to change the keyboard because it is not comfortable to write at all. If you want to write fast, get something different. If you use the protector on top of it, it becomes more difficult to use. The mouse, on the other hand, is great, smooth and ergonomic. Honestly, I would buy just the mouse if I knew.
Very fast free delivery. Tested and working well. Very sleek and nice modern design. Comes with battery and keyboard protector. Very worth it. Thanks seller. 👍

Value for money. Keyboard is noisier than I was hoping and not very sturdy but given the price & it’s plastic, that’s to be expected. Mouse is a perfect size but the mouse wheel does not scroll smoothly. Colour and size of keyboard is great.
